experience.title: Intern – Opinion Monitoring & Data Science
responsibilities: Developed an automated data mining and monitoring pipeline in Pipedream, enabling real-time collection of social media data from over 5 platforms including Instagram, LinkedIn, YouTube, Bluesky, and CloudMedia, increasing data retrieval efficiency.
Engineered and optimized data pipelines by filtering, cleaning, and structuring over 28k Instagram Visibrain datasets, enhancing machine learning model accuracy.
Implemented LLM-based pipelines (ChatGPT API) for sentiment analysis, text extraction, and visual content interpretation with OCR & image captioning (GPT-4v Vision API / Jinaai SenceXplain).
Conducted the 'Migration Project', leveraging NLP and multimodal data analysis to study online narratives around immigration policy.
Integrated textual and visual embeddings to enhance sentiment and narrative detection, supporting model-driven insight generation.
experience.keySkills: Python, Data Mining, Pipedream Automation, NLP, LLMs (ChatGPT API), Sentiment Analysis, OCR, Multimodal Learning, Social Media Analytics

experience.title: Management Information System (MIS) Manager

Performed SQL-based data extraction, updates, and database operations for efficient management.
Developed advanced Excel reporting tools, including pivot tables, queries, and macros.
Designed and maintained Power BI dashboards to support data-driven decision-making.
Implemented RPA tools to automate repetitive tasks and streamline operational processes.
experience.keySkills: SQL, Power BI, Excel, RPA, Data Management

education.degree: Behavioral and Digital Economics for Effective Management (BDEEM)

academic.title: Impact of Scholarship on Academic Performance & Outcomes
academic.meta: M1, BDEEM • 01/2025 • Econometric Analysis and Model
academic.description: Research on how scholarships influence academic performance, attendance, and the Matthew and Pygmalion Effects in economics programs.
researchQuestions: What is the difference in academic performance between scholarship recipients and non-recipients?
Does receiving a scholarship influence student attendance and participation?
How does attendance impact academic performance for scholarship recipients?
How do the Matthew and Pygmalion Effects influence scholarship recipient success?
academic.keyFindings: Scholarships have a significant positive impact on academic performance and attendance, with compounding advantages observed through the Matthew Effect.

academic.title: Analyzing the Dynamics of Competition Policy: Insights from Antitrust and Growth
academic.description: Comprehensive analysis of competition policy models and their effectiveness in tracking and shaping economic policy.
researchQuestions: Does the new model help us better track competition policy?
Comparison between the new model and the old model with detailed analysis
Identification of major factors affecting and shaping the policy
What are the challenges and limitations of the study?
academic.keyFindings: The new model provides improved tracking capabilities with better identification of key policy factors, though limitations remain in cross-country comparisons.
